Spells:
Bestow Curse (B3 Necr): Touched suffers choice of Disadv on specified ability rolls, Disadv on attacks on self, require Wis save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Calm Emotions (B2 Ench): R60' 20' radius suppresses charm and fright or hostility (Cha neg) for conc or 1 min
Charm Person (B1 Ench): R30' Target regards you as a friend (Wis neg) for 1 hr or until harmed
Cloud Of Daggers (B2 Conj): R60' 5' cu inflicts 4d4 HP slashing for conc or 1 min
Compulsion (B4 Ench): R30' Self controls target movement (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Confusion (B4 Ench): R90' Creatures in 10' radius randomly 10% wander/50% do nothing/20% attack adjacent/20% act normally (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Dancing Lights (B0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights move 60' for conc or 1 min
Dispel Magic (B3 Abju): R120' Ends spell effects up to spell level 3 on target, higher levels require DC 10 + spell level check
Find The Path (B6 Divi): Self knows shortest path to destination for conc or 1 dy
Friends (B0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Cha checks w/target for conc or 1 min
Healing Word (B1 Evoc): R60' Target regains 1d4+1 HP
Heroism (B1 Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +1 temporary HP each rd for conc or 1 min
Hold Monster (B5 Ench): R90' Immobilizes target (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Lesser Restoration (B2 Abju): Touched becomes unblinded, undeafened, undiseased, unparalyzed, or unpoisoned
Light (B0 Evoc): Touched object lights 20' radius (Dex neg) for 1 hr
Mage Hand (B0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks moving up to 10 lb for 1 min
Minor Illusion (B0 Illu): R30' Creates sound of 1 creature or 5' cu image (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 min
Mislead (B5 Illu): Makes self invisible and creates illusory duplicate for conc or 1 hr
Polymorph (B4 Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wis neg) for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Sending (B3 Evoc): Self exchanges 25-word message with known target

True Strike (B0 Divi): R30' Self gains Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd
Magic Notes:
Font Of Inspiration: Refresh Bardic Inspiration after short rest
Magic Initiate (Bard): Know 2 B0 spells, cast 1 B1 spell/long rest
Bardic Inspiration: R60' Give +1d12 bonus to ability, attack, or saving throw w/in 10 min 1/short rest
Countercharm: R30' Performance gives friendly listeners Adv on saves vs. charm and fright for 1 rd
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Harmony: Produce minor elemental effects
Magical Secrets: Learn 6 additional spells from any class
Nimbus Of Pathos: Touched gains +4 AC, Adv on attack and saves, and +1d10 HP radiant damage and suffers crit on 18-20 for 1 min 1/long rest
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Song Of Rest: Friendly listeners regain +1d12 HP after short rest
